text: Never have I ever eaten a whole pizza by myself
Never have I ever forgotten someone's name immediately after being introduced
Never have I ever had a one-night stand
Never have I ever called in sick when I wasn't actually sick
Never have I ever fallen asleep during a movie in a theater
Most likely to become famous on social media
Most likely to survive a zombie apocalypse
Most likely to get married first
Most likely to become a millionaire
Most likely to get arrested for something silly
Waterfall! Everyone drinks until the person who drew this card stops
Categories: Name types of alcohol. First person who can't thinks of one drinks
Rhyme Time: Say a word, everyone must rhyme. First to fail drinks
Question Master: Ask questions. Anyone who answers directly drinks
Make a Rule: Create a rule everyone must follow. Breaking it = drink
